backend/main.mo: Defines two public functions: one to proxy OutCall.transform and another to fetch link previews via a MetaLink API with URL validation.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for two frontend changes related to replacing media in the AVAIL card and adding user-provided images as static assets.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files and sections across the project for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes plus global background and border styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the document title and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application layout rendering all major sections with a ThemeProvider and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, quick links, social links, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/ImageOpenInNewTa: Reusable component that wraps an image in a newâ€‘tab link with hover-scale effects.
frontend/src/components/LinkPreview.tsx: Displays a link preview card using useLinkPreview with loading, error, and success states.
frontend/src/components/MarqueeLinkPrevi: Renders a horizontally scrolling marquee of duplicated LinkPreview components.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navbar with scroll detection, smooth-scroll behavior, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Displays an About section with background, bio paragraphs, and buttons to download a CV or view a portfolio.
frontend/src/components/sections/AskMyNa: Shows example prompts and a CTA button that scrolls to the contact section. Wrapped in a styled card with header and description.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form with validation, mailto submission, clipboard copy, and social links. Manages form state, errors, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Renders an experience timeline using content data, showing roles, periods, descriptions, and highlights. Supports images and badges for each entry.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero header with background image, name, headlines, description, and CTA buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/MarketN: Lists writing topics and shows a marquee of links, plus buttons to browse notes or subscribe. Wrapped in a styled content card.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Empty placeholder file for a future portfolio section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Section: Reusable section header component supporting title, optional subtitle, and alignment.
frontend/src/components/sections/Selecte: Renders a grid of curated 'signals' cards with titles, descriptions, optional images, link previews, and external links. Uses UI components to display featured strategic work items.
frontend/src/components/sections/Selects: Displays a grid of select portfolio items with images, metadata, tags, and links. Pulls data from selectsContent and formats each item into a styled card.
frontend/src/components/XPostEmbed.tsx: Embeds an X/Twitter post by loading the widgets script and rendering a tweet blockquote. Uses a ref to load the widget when the URL changes.
frontend/src/content/aboutContent.ts: Exports brief biographical text describing marketing and growth experience in fintech and Web3.
frontend/src/content/aurientExperienceCo: Defines an experience item interface and exports a list of professional experience entries with roles, periods, descriptions, and highlights.
frontend/src/content/aurientSelectsConte: Defines a SelectItem interface and exports curated project entries with categories, descriptions, tags, years, and images.
frontend/src/content/marketNotesWritingL: Exports an array of external writing and publication links.
frontend/src/content/portfolioData.ts: Deprecated placeholder exporting an empty array.
frontend/src/content/servicesData.ts: Deprecated placeholder exporting an empty array.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines site-wide content including hero text, section titles, and subtitles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity, login, clear, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkPreview.ts: Fetches and caches link preview metadata via backend actor, parsing responses and handling invalid URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating React Query hooks exist; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, global styles, utilities, and custom animations/effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/categoryLabels.ts: Maps verbose category names to concise uppercase labels and exposes helper functions to retrieve them.
frontend/src/utils/contactMessage.ts: Formats contact form input into a structured text message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, known issues, image requirements, and pending feature requests for build planning.
